snippet: Already suffering from a dire lack of food aid and sanitation, displaced Syrians in Lebanon must now deal with bitterly cold winter weather.
lead_paragraph: Already suffering from a dire lack of food aid and sanitation, displaced Syrians in Lebanon must now deal with bitterly cold winter weather.
abstract: Displaced Syrians in Lebanon, already suffering from dire lack of food aid and sanitation, must now deal with bitterly cold winter weather.

headline.main: For Syrian Refugees Short of Food and Clean Water, Snow Is an Added Challenge
headline.print_headline: For Syrian Refugees Short of Food and Clean Water, Snow Is an Added Challenge
